channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 07:05 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region. Since further messages.
item.description: 游릭 07:05 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region. Since further messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 07:05 Driven the alarm to Sinelnikov District.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 游릭 07:05 Driven the alarm to Sinelnikov District.Creck on further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 05:00 plouting anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Novomoskovsky district-Pavlograd district-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marhanetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community
item.description: 游리 05:00 plouting anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Novomoskovsky district-Pavlograd district-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marhanetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 05:00 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District-Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 05:00 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District-Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
